title: No children node listing when changing data source for a data set in data set editor page of the query tab
OB: When changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab, there is no children node listing.
EB: When changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab, the children should be listed out.
SR:
1. Create a new data set without a SQL statement. 
2. Verify that the new data source has no database/table/column information. 
3. Attempt to change the data source. 
4. Observe that there is no listing of children nodes. 
5. Close the data set editor and reopen it. 
6. Repeat steps 3-5 and verify that the children nodes are now listed.
